Package kulami.gui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameObserver  
    MessagePager
    Classes that wish to receive messages intended for the user must implement the MessagePager interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameDisplay  
    Mainframe
    The Mainframe is the central GUI element.
    MapEditor  
    MapPainter  
    MessageDisplay
    MessageDisplay handles displaying of messages in a text panel shown to the user.
    NewGameDialog  
    PlayerDialog
